fieldUpdates.description: updates notes with Timestamp and Person who input the note
fieldUpdates.formula: "***" & BR() & "Notes by :" & " " & $User.FirstName & " " & $User.LastName & " " & LEFT(TEXT(NOW()-0.1666667),16) & " EST" & BR() & BR() & FinReq_Notes__c
fieldUpdates.name: Update FinReq Notes with TS

fieldUpdates.description: updates res comments with Timestamp and person who input the comment
fieldUpdates.formula: "***" & BR() & "Notes by :" & " " & $User.FirstName & " " & $User.LastName & " " & LEFT(TEXT(NOW()-0.1666667),16) & " EST" & BR() & BR() & Resolution_Comments__c
fieldUpdates.name: Update FinReq ResComments with TS

You are registered as a CC on this support request

rules.description: Out of Office, Automatic Replies, etc

rules.description: Assignment for what used to be Queue:PGi-FinReq-NA-Tier 1-CEM (BHD)
Sends email notifying requestor (contains @pgi) when NA Credit is approved. This is OUTSIDE of the NA Credit Approval process.
Sends email notifying team of a new case as well as the Sales Rep to confirm details to avoid delay.
Sends email notifying requestor/Sales User (contains @pgi) when Pricing approval is approved, rejected, or cancelled. or when the "Status" is completed
When Status changes send email to requestor
rules.formula: AND( ISCHANGED (Status__c), Contains (Requested_For__c, "@pgi"), OR( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'PGi_Billing_Support', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'PGi_Credit_Request', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'PGi_Payment_Research_Request', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'PGi_Profile_Request', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'PGi_Rate_Entry_Request', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'PGi_Request_for_Adjustment', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'PGi_Revenue_Assurance_Audit_Request', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'PGi_Company_Cancellation_Request') )

rules.description: For company credit hold FinReqs, set status to Pending Approval(s) and send emails
When Status changes send email to requestor
other Assignment notifications

rules.fullName: PGi-FinReq-Pricing Help Request Set Pricing Approval Status
rules.description: When FinReq Status changes to Approved, set Pricing Approval Status to Approved
New NA FinReq requires approval
Routes to correct queue based on region
Routes to correct queue based on region
Routes to correct queue based on region
adds a new line and time stamp to notes and sends email to sales rep/assigned to
rules.formula: AND( CONTAINS( RecordType.Name, "PGi-Pricing Help Request"), NOT (ispickval(Region__c, "")), ISCHANGED(FinReq_Notes__c), LEFT(FinReq_Notes__c, 2) <> "**" )

rules.description: adds a new line and time stamp to resolution commentsand sends email to sales rep/assigned to
rules.formula: AND( CONTAINS( RecordType.Name, "PGi-Pricing Help Request"), ISPICKVAL( Region__c , "EMEA"), ISCHANGED( Resolution_Comments__c ), LEFT(Resolution_Comments__c , 2) <> "**" )
